results.author: Michael Jordan
results.content: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

results.author: Henry David Thoreau
results.content: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.

results.author: Vince Lombardi
results.content: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

results.author: Babe Ruth
results.content: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.

results.author: Bob Feller
results.content: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.

results.author: Dan Gable
results.content: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.

results.author: Bobby Unser
results.content: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

results.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
results.content: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.

results.author: Barry Switzer
results.content: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple.

results.author: Wayne Gretzky
results.content: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.

results.author: Michael Phelps
results.content: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.

results.author: Mia Hamm
results.content: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.

results.author: Muhammad Ali
results.content: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.

results.author: George Orwell
results.content: Serious sport has nothing to do with fair play. It is bound up with hatred, jealousy, boastfulness, disregard of all rules and sadistic pleasure in witnessing violence. In other words, it is war minus the shooting.

results.author: Eric Liddell
results.content: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.

results.author: Yogi Berra
results.content: Half the lies they tell about me aren't true.

results.author: P. G. Wodehouse
results.content: To find a man's true character, play golf with him.

results.author: Earl Monroe
results.content: Just be patient. Let the game come to you. Don't rush. Be quick, but don't hurry.

results.author: Billie Jean King
results.content: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

results.author: Heywood Broun
results.content: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.

results.author: Casey Stengel
results.content: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.

results.author: Reggie Jackson (basketball, born 1990)
results.content: Fans don't boo nobodies.

results.author: Shaquille O'Neal
results.content: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, and wear Reebok.

results.author: Ian Botham
results.content: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.

results.author: Knute Rockne
results.content: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than a hundred teaching it.

results.author: William James
results.content: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.

results.author: Hank Aaron
results.content: My motto was always to keep swinging. Whether I was in a slump or feeling badly or having trouble off the field, the only thing to do was keep swinging.

results.author: Jim Bouton
results.content: You spend a good piece of your life gripping a baseball and in the end it turns out that it was the other way around all the time.

results.author: Rogers Hornsby
results.content: People ask me what I do in winter when there's no baseball. I'll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.

results.author: Ernie Banks
results.content: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.

results.author: Sandy Koufax
results.content: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.

results.author: Carl Lewis
results.content: Life is about timing.

results.author: Ted Williams
results.content: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.

results.author: Robert Griffin III
results.content: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.

results.author: Erma Bombeck
results.content: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.

results.author: Joe Adcock
results.content: Trying to sneak a fastball past Hank Aaron is like trying to sneak the sunrise past a rooster.

results.author: Mike Singletary (basketball)
results.content: Do you know what my favorite part of the game is? The opportunity to play.

results.author: Bob Knight
results.content: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.

results.author: Woodrow Wilson
results.content: Golf is a game in which one endeavors to control a ball with implements ill adapted for the purpose.

results.author: Billie Jean King
results.content: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity.

results.author: Arnold Palmer
results.content: What other people may find in poetry or art museums, I find in the flight of a good drive.

results.author: Hugo Black
results.content: When I was 40, my doctor advised me that a man in his 40s shouldn't play tennis. I heeded his advice carefully and could hardly wait until I reached 50 to start again.

results.author: John Madden
results.content: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.

results.author: Mark Twain
results.content: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.

results.author: Colin Powell
results.content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

results.author: Seneca the Younger
results.content: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.

results.author: J. Paul Getty
results.content: If you owe the bank $100 that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.

results.author: Elon Musk
results.content: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.

results.author: Sam Walton
results.content: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.

results.author: Ambrose Bierce
results.content: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling.

results.author: Tom Brokaw
results.content: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference.

results.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin
results.content: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.

results.author: Jeff Bezos
results.content: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.

results.author: Peter Drucker
results.content: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.

results.author: Don Marquis
results.content: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.

results.author: Jack Welch
results.content: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.

results.author: Thomas Jefferson
results.content: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.

results.author: Napoleon Hill
results.content: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.

results.author: Henry Ford
results.content: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.

results.author: Aristotle Onassis
results.content: The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows.

results.author: Charles F. Kettering
results.content: If you want to kill any idea in the world, get a committee working on it.

results.author: Laurence J. Peter
results.content: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.

results.author: Dee Hock
results.content: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.

results.author: Leo Rosten
results.content: First-rate people hire first-rate people; second-rate people hire third-rate people.

results.author: Olivier Messiaen
results.content: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.

results.author: Confucius
results.content: The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.

results.author: Mary Kay Ash
results.content: Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, 'Make me feel important.' Never forget this message when working with people.

results.author: Niccolò Machiavelli
results.content: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution.

results.author: Harold Geneen
results.content: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.

results.author: Robert Kiyosaki
results.content: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.

results.author: André Malraux
results.content: To command is to serve, nothing more and nothing less.

results.author: John Kenneth Galbraith
results.content: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything.

results.author: Howard H. Aiken
results.content: Don't worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you'll have to ram them down people's throats.

results.author: Edward Gibbon
results.content: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.

results.author: Warren Bennis
results.content: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.

results.author: Elon Musk
results.content: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

results.author: Ralph Marston
results.content: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

results.author: H. G. Wells
results.content: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

results.author: George S. Patton
results.content: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

results.author: Ken Venturi
results.content: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.

results.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
results.content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

results.author: W. Clement Stone
results.content: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

results.author: Sam Levenson
results.content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

results.author: Benjamin Disraeli
results.content: Never complain and never explain.

results.author: Robert Schuller
results.content: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

results.author: John F. Kennedy
results.content: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.

results.author: Amelia Earhart
results.content: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

results.author: Pauline Kael
results.content: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.

results.author: Babe Ruth
results.content: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.

results.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
results.content: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

results.author: Kyle Chandler
results.content: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

results.author: Ayn Rand
results.content: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

results.author: Nikos Kazantzakis
results.content: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

results.author: William Blake
results.content: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Now this is not the end. It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: If you're going through hell, keep going.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: You can always count on Americans to do the right thing - after they've tried everything else.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: The truth is incontrovertible. Malice may attack it, ignorance may deride it, but in the end, there it is.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: History is written by the victors.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: The farther backward you can look, the farther forward you can see.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: I am an optimist. It does not seem too much use being anything else.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Russia is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: An appeaser is one who feeds a crocodile, hoping it will eat him last.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: If we open a quarrel between past and present, we shall find that we have lost the future.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: The inherent vice of capitalism is the unequal sharing of blessings; the inherent virtue of socialism is the equal sharing of miseries.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: In wartime, truth is so precious that she should always be attended by a bodyguard of lies.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities... because it is the quality which guarantees all others.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: Nothing in life is so exhilarating as to be shot at without result.

results.author: Winston Churchill
results.content: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.

results.author: Abraham Lincoln
results.content: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.

results.author: Abraham Lincoln
results.content: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
